original_title: Hackaday Podcast Ep 351: Hackaday Goes To Chaos Communication Congress
original_content:
Elliot was of at Europes largest hacker convention: Chaos Communication Congress. He had an awesome time, saw more projects than you might think humanely possible, and got the flu. But he pulled through and put this audio tourbook for you.
So if youve never been to CCC, give it a listen!

In the far future, all the cool kids will be downloading MP3s of their favorite podcasts.
Where to Follow Hackaday PodcastPlaces to follow Hackaday podcasts:


	iTunes
	Spotify
	Stitcher
	RSS
		YouTube
	Check
		out our Libsyn landing page


Whats That Sound

If you think you know what the mystery sound was this week, give us your best guess for a chance at a Hackaday Podcast t-shirt.
title: - ヨーロッパ最大のハッカー祭典「Chaos Communication Congress」体験記
body: Elliotがハッカー会議での体験を語る音声ガイド。
titles: - ヨーロッパ最大のハッカー祭典「Chaos Communication Congress」体験記
- エリオットの音声ツアーブック：CCCの魅力を聞こう
- ハッカデイポッドキャスト：時間を忘れる楽しみ
- 謎の音を当てて、ハッカデイTシャツをゲットしよう！
- 未来のポッドキャストライフ：MP3で楽しむ新時代
